data.actual_result: Role name resets back to "new role" without any message
data.short_description: Saving a role with too long a name resets the name with no message
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new role on a server that has two words - Make the first word something short, and just hold down the "l" button for about five seconds - After letting go of the button, click the save button and observe the role name
